title: LÍLLÉbaby Bundle of Love - 4-in-1 Essentials All Seasons Baby Carrier, Seahorse + Infant Insert, Grey
features: COMFORT OPTIONS: Front, Hip, and Back Suitable for 15-45lbs. (7-15lbs with optional *infant insert (*Infant insert sold separately)
LIGHTWIGHT & COMFORTABLE: This classic 4 in 1 carrier is a perfect fit for mobility with your baby
EASY ACCESS: Large zippered cargo pocket has ample room to store all your necessities for a truly hands free experience

FOUR POSITIONS: The LÍLLÉbaby ESSENTIALS Original carrier is made from soft, durable cotton and easily transitions between four ergonomic carry styles and is the perfect on-the-go babywearing solution

VERSATILE CARRYING: With two-way straps allowing you to carry backpack style or forwards, the LÍLLÉbaby ESSENTIALS Baby Carrier provides comfort & support for you and your child no matter where you go

HANDS-FREE COMFORT: When on-the-go, LÍLLÉbaby's baby carriers & toddler carriers let you hold your child in comfort and style. Adjustable side panels widen & narrow the seat for comfortable hip positioning
OPTIONAL ACCESSORIES: Infant insert sold separately
description: Life with little ones requires staying ready for just about anything, and our All-Seasons carrier is designed to adapt as quickly as you do. Our zip-down front panel gives you the option to control baby’s temperature by revealing our breathable, soft-wearing mesh. Parenting is unpredictable, but your comfort doesn’t have to be.  Lightweight and comfortable, this classic 4 in 1 carrier is a perfect fit for mobility with your baby. The LÍLLÉbaby Essentials baby carrier combines the basics of babywearing with LILLEbaby's signature commitment to quality and style. This classically constructed 4-position carrier, made from our softest, most durable cotton, includes 3-way adjustable straps that can be crossed or adjusted for easy breastfeeding access and a large cargo pocket to store all of your parenting necessities.  Suitable for: Front, Hip, and Back from 15-45lbs. - Optional Insert Available for 7-15lbs with optional *infant insert (*Infant insert sold separately)
